info: The goal of the Program is to improve the living conditions and well-being of number of people int he conflict affected areas by restoring basic social infrstructure, community and public services, and livelihoods. The Program will provide basic needs in the conflict-affected areas through income-generation activities through rural roads, water supply and sanitation, community development and institutional infrastructure.
name: PART ADMIN(UK PORTION ONLY)RURAL RECNSTCTN&REHAB S
